JP? I was wondering, have you responded to my post with Sublime?

* Without even thinking why, Sublime entered onto the battlefield around the
CF. Though she can come around on the eastern side and saw something that
she was sure wasn't right.
There were 4 transformers bearing down on the CF with all the firepower they
seemed to have. ( Aquarious, Black Aracnia, Bezerker, and Quickstrike )
Removing a small dagger from her waist she looked it over, squeezing the
handle a little and watching a green ooz slime out of the edges.
Poison, one that would sieze the spark.
Without ni prime directive she threw it at the back of the nearest enemy,
Berzerker.*

I was just wondering because I haven't picked up on any response yet, if you 
have then I'll look over my posts again.
